text: Jan Schleiss (born September 1, 1994) is a Czech professional ice hockey player. He is currently playing for HC Plzeň of the Czech Extraliga. Schleiss made his Czech Extraliga debut playing with HC Plzeň during the 2012-13 Czech Extraliga season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:HC Plzeň players Category:Czech ice hockey forwards Category:Sportspeople from Plzeň
title: Jan Schleiss
